articles.title: The White House starts demolishing part of the East Wing to build Trump’s ballroom
articles.description:
The White House has moved ahead with the massive construction project despite not yet having sign-off from the National Capital Planning Commission, which approves construction work and major renovations to government buildings in the Washington area.

articles.title: Patriots coach Mike Vrabel is quickly moving on to another familiar opponent, the Browns
articles.description:
FOXBOROUGH — After Sunday’s blowout victory over the Titans that led to Drake Maye handing him a game ball, Patriots coach Mike Vrabel is now preparing for the Browns.
